Package com.foreach.across.core.development

Class AcrossDevelopmentMode

java.lang.Object
com.foreach.across.core.development.AcrossDevelopmentMode
public class AcrossDevelopmentMode extends Object
Bean that is created if development mode is active on the AcrossContext.
Author:
Arne Vandamme

  • Method Details

    • isActive

      public boolean isActive()
      Returns:
      True if development mode is enabled on the context.

    • getBuildId

      public String getBuildId()
      Get a unique build id that changes between application restarts.
      Returns:
      unique build id

    • getDevelopmentLocation

      public String getDevelopmentLocation(AcrossModuleEntity module, String path)
      Determines a physical location for any path in the resources folder of a module.
      Parameters:
      module - Module instance.
      path - Relative path to resolve.
      Returns:
      Physical path or null if it could not be resolved.

    • getDevelopmentLocations

      public Map<String,String> getDevelopmentLocations(String path)
      Determines the map of physical resource locations for module resources. This method is different in that it simply resolves a physical directory instead of an assumed module resource directory. Stated differently: the resource key is not included in the generated locations.
      Returns:
      Map containing the resource key and physical location.

    • getDevelopmentLocationForResourcePath

      public String getDevelopmentLocationForResourcePath(AcrossModuleEntity module, String path)
      Determines a physical location for a particular module resource.
      Parameters:
      module - Module instance.
      path - Relative path to resolve.
      Returns:
      Physical path or null if it could not be resolved.

    • getDevelopmentLocationsForResourcePath

      public Map<String,String> getDevelopmentLocationsForResourcePath(String path)
      Determines the map of physical resource locations to use for a given type of resource (identified by the path). The key in the returned map is the module path for the resources. This method will iterate over all registered modules and see if they have a local development location available.
      Parameters:
      path - Path identifying the type of resource.
      Returns:
      Map containing the resource key and physical location.
